questionText: Which kind of living space best comforts you?

answerOptions.answerText: A blue house in the suburbs surrounded by nice gardens and some pets.
A yellow house in the countryside with a close circle of friends living together.
A slightly remote attic room with a window view of beautiful cityscapes.
A flat in the modern city center with nice cafes in the neighborhood.

questionText: If you were to start making arts, which of the following subjects would you work on?

answerOptions.answerText: Self portraits recording different stages of your life and your realities.
Your familiar Interior surroundings and people whose company you enjoy.
Abstract concepts reflecting the subconsciousness of your mind.
The luxurious lives of flamboyant people which make you feel the joy of good material life.

questionText: After a tiring day of work, which activity helps with relieving your stress?

answerOptions.answerText: Reading in your room with some nice music.
Taking a walk on the streets and immerse yourself with people viewing.
Hanging out with friends to talk about your day.
Going into nature and enjoying beautiful sceneries.

questionText: You woke up from a nightmare, and it was about:

answerOptions.answerText: Having an argument with your best friend.
Learning that your partner is dating another person you also know.
Going bankrupt due to business failure.
Assigned to the same project with a colleague you donâ€™t get along well.
